name: A MATHKING97 Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters in "MATHKING", find a 4-letter word for a person who rules the land.
questions.explanation:
King.

	A king is someone who rules a land, called a kingdom.  If a queen rules the land, it is called a queendom.  A king can also be a playing card or a chess piece.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word, using only letters in "MATHKING", that means a subject in school where you learn to add, subtract, and much more!
questions.explanation:
Math.

	Math, or maths, is a subject in school where kids are taught numbers, like 1, 2, and 3, and how to add, subtract, and multiply them.  There are many different things to do with math, and many different kinds of math, too!

questions.text: Using only letters in "MATHKING", find a 3-letter word for a food made from pigs.
questions.explanation:
Ham.

	Ham is a food that comes from pigs.  It can come in all different shapes and sizes; hamhock, little ham cubes, sliced deli ham, and even ham steaks!  Pork also comes from pigs, as does bacon.

questions.text: Using only letters found in "MATHKING", find a 3-letter word for an adult male.
questions.explanation:
Man.

	A young male is known as a boy, but when they grow up into an adult male, they are a man.  A young female is known as a girl, and when they grow up into an adult female, they are a woman.

questions.text: Using only letters in "MATHKING", find a 4-letter word meaning skinny.
questions.explanation:
Thin.

	If someone is thin, they are skinny.  Thin does not just refer to people, though.  It can refer to anything, like a CD or paper.

questions.text: Find a 5-letter word that is a polite thing to do if someone gives you a gift, using only letters in "MATHKING".
questions.explanation:
Thank.

	If someone gives you a gift or does something nice for you, it is polite to thank them.  You can do this by saying "thanks" or "thank you".  It is rude to not say anything if someone does something nice for you.

questions.text: Find a 3-letter word, using only letters in "MATHKING", that is the liquid inside of a pen.
questions.explanation:
Ink.

	Ink is what allows a pen to write.  Ink comes in all sorts of colors, like red, blue, black, green, and orange, to name a few.

questions.text: Using only letters in "MATHKING", find a 3-letter word for something you wear on your head.
questions.explanation:
Hat.

	A hat is something you wear on your head.  There are many different shapes and sizes of hats, and different kinds, too!  There are fedoras, beanies, baseball caps, straw hats, toques, and many others.

questions.text: Using only letters found in "MATHKING", find a 4-letter word that means to acquire something.
questions.explanation:
Gain.

	If you acquire something, you obtain it, or gain it.  It is now yours.  For instance, if you obtain first place in a race, you have "gained the lead".

questions.text: Using only letters found in "MATHKING", find a 3-letter word for a light brown color.
questions.explanation:
Tan.

	Tan is a light brown color, but is darker than beige.  It can also be darkened skin from the sun.
